attributes.additional_details:
These modified vehicle exhausts are making so much noise.
I was walking with my 4 year old son and a car was passing near us, the driver was deliberately making the noise. My son got scared and there I decided to start this petition.
attributes.background: Please stop the noisy modified vehicles’ exhausts.

rejection.details:
It's already illegal to alter an exhaust to make it exceed legal noise limits.

You could start a petition to lower the noise limits, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
